alert.note: Alert for Adams; Greeley; Hall; Howard; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 12 at 12:05PM CST until January 12 at 3:00PM CST by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM CST THIS AFTERNOON... ...WIND CHILL WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON CST TUESDAY... ...WINTER STORM WARNING HAS EXPIRED... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...For the Winter Weather Advisory, additional snow accumulations up to one inch. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. For the Wind Chill Warning, dangerously cold wind chills expected. Wind chills as low as 45 below zero. * WHERE...Greeley, Howard, Adams, Hall, and Webster Counties. * WHEN...For the Winter Weather Advisory, until 3 PM CST this afternoon. For the Wind Chill Warning, from 6 PM this evening to noon CST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...The hazardous conditions could impact the Friday evening and Monday morning commutes. The dangerously cold wind chills could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1. Avoid outside activities if possible. When outside, make sure you wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves.
